Text:
Comment on quality and pls seed........
sample included.......
Note: Not Taking Requests

Finally someone who understands x264 > xvid/divx. I have a question though, why do you do a H264 AND an x264 release when they're identical quality and the x264 version is half the size? Just seems like a waste of bandwidth. Great uploader, Thanks for everything, especially Restrepo.

@wopdeda the h264 is mp4 with higher bitrate and better quality suitable for big lcd/led screens and has better compatibility with diff players...
the x264 is mkv more suited for pc and for people who have low bandwidth

The Audio is out of sync (from the source 720p@7Sins)
Using MKVMerge remux it...Delay the Audio by  7110ms and it is fixed. or use VLC (j,k)
Cheers Uploader..thanks :D
found video quality good but audio out of sync.

First upload from mitzep where I have a prob.
the audio is somehow not in sync with video. Damn anybody any clue till what should I delay the audio in vlc?
please tell me what to do about audio-visual synchronization? I tried correcting it with VLC and failed.
